Title: Finding and Saving Product Information
Content: The first step in quickly listing products on Xiaohongshu using a mobile device is to find and save the product information. You can source products from platforms like Taobao, Pinduoduo, and JD.com. Once you have identified the products you want to list, use a tool like 'Zhizunbao' to save the product links, images, and detailed descriptions. Zhizunbao is a useful tool that helps you gather all necessary product information efficiently. Ensure you have all the product details saved before proceeding to the next steps. This preparation is crucial for a smooth and quick listing process.

Title: Using Xiaohongshu's Mobile App for Product Listing
Content: The second step involves using the Xiaohongshu mobile app to list your products. Open the app and navigate to 'My Shop' at the bottom of the screen. From there, go to 'Manage Shop' and select the option to list a new product. This step is essential for initializing the product listing process. For new accounts, it is important to follow these steps carefully to ensure your products are listed correctly. The app provides a user-friendly interface that makes it easy to manage your shop and list products directly from your mobile device.

Title: Completing Product Information and Enabling Payment Options
Content: The third step is to complete all necessary product information and enable payment options. Fill in details such as your shipping address, logistics model, and any required security deposits. Even if you are using a dropshipping model, you need to provide accurate information. Enabling WeChat Pay is crucial as it is a popular payment method on Xiaohongshu. Ensure that your customer service options are set up as well. Once all information is filled out, save the product images and SKU details. This step ensures that your product listing is complete and ready for customers to purchase. The process is straightforward and can be done entirely through your mobile device, making it convenient and efficient.
